ai-patthana15.78:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.78:0.3_0: Seeing for the sake of his (permission) allowable for them,
ai-patthana15.78:1.1_0: Gaining has no cause or condition for the sake of seeing, not for the sake of seeing, you should give up cause and reason.
ai-patthana15.78:1.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.78:2.1_0: The reason for the sake of developing the teaching ...
ai-patthana15.78:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.78:3.1_0: without development, because of developing and cultivating these two factors, they should not give up a cause, with no reason for developing without a reason.
